questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Art and culture
D) Buildings, architecture and nature

What is the main focus of the photo?
A) A group of people
B) A building with a café
C) A piece of art
D) A body of water

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A tree
B) A car
C) The building with the café
D) A person

What is in the background of the photo?
A) A city skyline
B) A mountain range
C) A grassy hill
D) The ocean

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) A lake
B) A road and greenery
C) A playground
D) A market

What is the relationship between the foreground and the background?
A) They are both urban elements
B) They are both natural elements
C) The foreground is urban, and the background is natural
D) The foreground is natural, and the background is urban

What type of building is in the photo?
A) A residential house
B) A commercial building
C) A café and inn
D) A school

What color is the building in the photo?
A) Red
B) Blue
C) Yellow
D) White

What additional feature is visible on the building?
A) A swimming pool
B) A café sign
C) A playground
D) A garden

A) Bicycles
B) Motorcycles
C) Cars
D) Buses

What type of vegetation is visible in the photo?
A) Desert plants
B) Tropical plants
C) Grassy and leafy plants
D) No vegetation

A) Paved and dry
B) Paved and wet
C) Unpaved and dry
D) Unpaved and wet

What is the name visible on the building?
A) Café Delight
B) Doolin Inn
C) Mountain View
D) Seaside Café

What type of landscape surrounds the building?
A) Desert
B) Forest
C) Grassland
D) Beach

A) Red
B) Green
C) Blue
D) Gray

A) Well-maintained
B) Overgrown
C) Sparse
D) Non-existent

A) Flat
B) Hilly
C) Mountainous
D) Sandy

A) Clear and blue
B) Partly cloudy
C) Overcast
D) Stormy

What additional structures are visible near the building?
A) A playground
B) Another house
C) A water fountain
D) A market stall

What is the overall condition of the building?
A) New and well-kept
B) Old and dilapidated
C) Under construction
D) Abandoned

A) Wooden and metal fence 
B) Stone wall
C) Metal fence
D) No fence

A) Bicycles
B) Cars
C) Trains
D) Boats

What is the primary color of the vegetation in the photo?
A) Green
B) Brown
C) Yellow
D) Red

What type of lighting is present in the photo?
A) Natural daylight
B) Artificial streetlights
C) Candlelight
D) No lighting

What kind of plants are in the garden area?
A) Cacti and succulents
B) Tropical plants
C) Grasses and shrubs

B) Rocks

D) Sand

B) Small, traditional windows

A) Dining and accommodation
